typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as short,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		Title as string,
		HireDate as date,
		BirthDate as date,
		Phone as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		EmergencyContactName as string,
		EmergencyContactPhone as string,
		SalariedFlag as boolean,
		Gender as string,
		DepartmentName as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	wildcardPaths:['2021/*.csv']) ~> srcEmployee
source(output(
		EmployeeKey as integer,
		EmpID as short,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		MiddleName as string,
		Title as string,
		HireDate as date,
		BirthDate as date,
		Phone as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		EmergencyContactName as string,
		EmergencyContactPhone as string,
		SalariedFlag as boolean,
		Gender as string,
		DepartmentName as string,
		StartDate as date,
		EndDate as string,
		Status as string,
		IsActive as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcEmployeeDim
SelectColumns derive(inputhash = md5(EmpID,LastName,Title,Phone,MaritalStatus,SalariedFlag,DepartmentName)) ~> HASHInput
srcEmployeeDim derive(sqlhash = md5(EmpID,LastName,Title,Phone,MaritalStatus,SalariedFlag,DepartmentName)) ~> HASHRef
ExistsCheckforUpdates derive(IsActive = 1,
		EndDate = toDate('9999-12-31')) ~> SetToActive
HASHInput, HASHRef exists(inputhash == sqlhash,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsCheckforUpdates
HASHRef, SetToActive exists(srcEmployeeDim@EmpID == SelectColumns@EmpID
	&& srcEmployeeDim@LastName == SelectColumns@LastName
	&& srcEmployeeDim@Title == SelectColumns@Title
	&& srcEmployeeDim@Phone == SelectColumns@Phone
	&& srcEmployeeDim@MaritalStatus == SelectColumns@MaritalStatus
	&& srcEmployeeDim@SalariedFlag == SelectColumns@SalariedFlag
	&& srcEmployeeDim@DepartmentName == SelectColumns@DepartmentName,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> ExistsCheckforObsolete
ExistsCheckforObsolete derive(EndDate = toDate(currentUTC()),
		IsActive = 0) ~> SetToInActive
SetToInActive alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
srcEmployee select(mapColumn(
		EmpID,
		FirstName,
		LastName,
		MiddleName,
		Title,
		HireDate,
		BirthDate,
		Phone,
		MaritalStatus,
		EmergencyContactName,
		EmergencyContactPhone,
		SalariedFlag,
		Gender,
		DepartmentName,
		StartDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SetToActive sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		dept,
		isactive = IsActive,
		startdate,
		enddate = EndDate
	)) ~> SinkEmployeeDimInsert
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['id','name','dept'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		dept,
		isactive = IsActive,
		enddate = EndDate
	)) ~> SinkEmployeeDimUpdate
